summary: This mod is aimed to change how perks are awarded to the player, introducing perk tomes instead of perk points per level.
descriptionHtml:
=====================
+++CURRENT VERSION+++
=====================

V1.01 - June 11th 2012

=================
+++Description+++
=================

This mod is aimed to change how perks are awarded to the player, introducing perk tomes. Instead of thinking of these abilities as perks, consider them as books of knowledge that can further your skill and mastery in a way that made you better than ordinary mages, warriors and thieves. These tomes completely replace the gain of perks through leveling. The tomes will be scattered around Skyrim in locations relevant to their content. So advanced techniques in stealth for example will likely be located in the possession of stealthy factions. Also, magical knowledge is probably found in the libraries of the College of Winterhold.

================
+++DOWNLOAD+++
================

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9607

==============
+++Features+++
==============

-Perk Tomes will replace perk points when leveling.
-Perk Tomes are relevantly located in places of interest, regarding the skills they\'re based on.
-No additional Perk points when levelling. (Thanks to Elys)
-Unlimited Perks thanks to the new Perk Tome system.
-New reasons to explore.

==================
+++Requirements+++
==================

You will need to download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1175]Skyrim -Community- Uncapper[/url] from Nexus, and install it.
You will also need to manually set perk awarding in the uncapper ini file (.../skyrim/data/skse/plugins/) to 0 from level one to achieve the purpose of this mod.
Please be mindful of the fact, that every time you manually update the uncapper, you will have to set this value in the ini all over again.

-Skyrim 1.4 or Later
-Latest SKSE

==================
+++Installation+++
==================

Manual: Extract archive to Skyrim/Data folder. Click yes to Overwrite old files.
Automatic: Install with Nexus Mod Manager.
WARNING: If you downloaded the high chance ESP, use only that or the original, but not both!

=======================
+++Upcoming Features+++
=======================

-Likely new book models.
-Compatibility patches to some high reputation mods that change or add perks.
-Trainer NPCs along with Perk Tomes, so you can choose your way of learning.
-A Seeing Stone for locating some higher level perk tomes and trainers.
-Modules for other aspects of the game.

===================
+++Compatibility+++
===================

-Some containers and inventories are altered in faction locations.
-Some leveled lists are changed.

================
+++Known Bugs+++
================

-I\'m expecting some heavy testing until I can say. I have found none yet.
Please point out any grammar, or spelling issues!

================
+++Change Log+++
================

V1.0 - Current Version. - February 18th 2012.
-Perk Tomes are prefixed with \'Perk Tome:\'
-The probability of finding a perk tome is increased.
-Perk Tomes are of very high value. They are consumed upon learning just as Spell Tomes.
-Fixed and added some minor things.

Beta Prime - Initial Release. - February 14th 2012.

=============
+++Credits+++
=============

Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK,
And several quick commenters for my help pleas regarding Papyrus.
UESP Wiki.

Thanks to you all!

===============
+++Copyright+++
===============

License.
